    • About Rick Sadle


    The Sadle Home Selling Team is comprised of a team of local real estate professionals committed to selling some of the most desired homes in Portland and Vancouver. Selling these “right addresses” is the mission of The Sadle Home Selling Team. Let us know what you’re looking for. Please take advantage of the helpful tools on this website, including our exclusive Portland and Vancouver Real Estate search, but also feel free to contact us personally.
